text:
@maddow Trump has shown ZERO respect for:
- COVID19🦠
- scientists🔬
- health organizations💉
- frontline medical workers
- needs of essential workers
- local officials 
- 50m unemployed 
- well-being of kids & family 
- Americans’ health & livelihood

And Americans are paying the price.
